amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the National Park Service by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in the Congressional Record to increase $1,000,000 (by transfer) regarding Operation of the National Park System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Weiner.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
